channel.title: Beat the Clock #22
channel.description:
Time to Beat the Clock!
This week's host is @Andrew_Adams who will present the challenge below and pick his favorites on Monday.
Let's do this!

item.title: Beat the Clock #22
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
some people re-download the project, some people do give up and that’s unfortunate, and there’s also the possibility of people not posting it on the forum but to SC. I’ve downloaded the project twice as well in the past, pretty sure on BTC 16 because I messed up the drums there.

Read full topic

item.title: Beat the Clock #22
item.dc:creator: Cheddr
item.description:
Its interesting that as of right now 517 people clicked on the blank project in the initial BTC description
then there were well over 200 posts in this topic (not submissions, but posts) …
…but then only 47 clicks on the results.
I’m curious how many tracks roughly were submitted.And do that any people give up?

Read full topic

item.title: Beat the Clock #22
item.dc:creator: LittleSpikes
item.description:
Congrats to everyone who in shortlist and great job to everyone who submitted this challenge.

I had very sad event in my personal life this weekend and I was not able to make any music, but since I love the idea of the challenge and I am a big fan of Andrew, I will do this challenge within this week. (No motivation for being selected, just for fun, for myself)

By the way, who drew these beautiful pictures? Since there is no credit for artwork, I’m afraid of artwork plagiarism. Could you tell me the source of artwork? @Andrew_Adams

Read full topic

item.title: Beat the Clock #22
item.dc:creator: TMAR
item.description:
@Andrew_Adams dude thank you so much for featuring me on this! I feel Everyone did an incredible job of it’s this competition. there was so much heart in people’s tracks with it being the subject of emotions and that really showed in the music.

Can’t wait for the next BTC!

Once again @Andrew_Adams solid effort on the idea this was so fun!

Read full topic

item.title: Beat the Clock #22
item.dc:creator: Bassment_Chemists
item.description:
I listen to every entry every weekend. And then I like, i.e. Heart them in soundcloud, then I see how many of of my picks make the shortlist. Well this week I’m not sure if I was being easier with my picks or the submissions really were that much better, but my list was like 50 deep instead of the usual 15-20. Great job everyone that made the list.

Read full topic

item.title: Beat the Clock #22
item.dc:creator: Andrew_Adams
item.description:
Wow guys, so many great submissions! I was extremely impressed with what you guys came up with, and really enjoyed getting to see how all of you tried to put emotion into your music. It was really hard to choose, but here’s the shortlist:

https://soundcloud.com/user-andrewadams/sets/beattheclock22

Read full topic

item.title: Beat the Clock #22
item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
It’s not stupid at all. Andrew doesn’t want to download hundreds of projects, listen to them, then delete them. I wouldn’t either.

You won’t even need a premium account to upload one BTC submission. Eventually you might need one, but you can cross that bridge when you come to it.

Read full topic
